General Purpose: T2.name: General Purpose: T2
General Purpose: T2.description: T2 instances are Burstable Performance Instances that provide a baseline level of CPU performance with the ability to burst above the baseline. The baseline performance and ability to burst are governed by CPU Credits.

General Purpose: M4.name: General Purpose: M4
General Purpose: M4.description: M4 instances provides a balance of compute, memory, and network resources, and are a good choice for many applications; featuring 2.3 GHz Intel Xeon® E5-2686 v4 (Broadwell) processors or 2.4 GHz Intel Xeon® E5-2676 v3 (Haswell) processors.

Compute Optimized: C4.name: Compute Optimized: C4
Compute Optimized: C4.description: C4 instances are optimized for compute-intensive workloads and delivers very cost-effective high performance at a low price/compute performance in EC2; featuring Intel Xeon E5-2666 v3 (Haswell) processors optimized specifically for EC2.

Memory Optimized: R3.name: Memory Optimized: R3
Memory Optimized: R3.description: R3 instances are optimized for memory-intensive applications and offer lower price per GiB of RAM; featuring Intel Xeon E5-2670 v2 (Ivy Bridge) Processors

Storage Optimized: I3.name: Storage Optimized: I3
Storage Optimized: I3.description: High Storage Instances provide storage optimized for low latency, very high random I/O performance, high sequential read throughput and provide high IOPS at a low cost; featuring 2.3 GHz Intel Xeon E5-2686 v4 (Broadwell) processors.

Storage Optimized: D2.name: Storage Optimized: D2
Storage Optimized: D2.description: D2 instances feature up to 48 TB of HDD-based local storage, deliver high disk throughput, and offer the lowest price per disk throughput performance on Amazon EC2; featuring ntel Xeon E5-2676v3 (Haswell) processors.
